#include <stdio.h>


int main(){

	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T-->0){
		int N;
		scanf("%d",&N);
		int* x=new int[N];
		int* y=new int[N];
		double area=0;
		for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
			scanf("%d",&x[i]);
		for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
			scanf("%d",&y[i]);
		for(int i=0;i<N-1;i++){
			area+=(y[i]+y[i+1])*(x[i+1]-x[i]);
		}
			area+=(y[N-1]+y[0])*(x[0]-x[N-1]);
		delete[] y;
		delete[] x;
		printf("%.1f\n",area/2);
	}
	
	
}
